thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 3 of 48
thread.title: Mc

author: Mc
title: Mc
text: Hi I have no problems with their service but I don't understand why they send you an email to submit your meter reading one to two days before the bill is confirmed. This is not enough notice especially in winter when it is not possible to check the meter in the evening. (Also it was difficult to get a meter box key from them so I don't have one - why not send one automatically when you join their service)
